meanings.definition: A person who is on a diet.
meanings.sent1: Many dieters choose to eat salads and fruits to lose weight.
meanings.sent2: The dieters in the group shared healthy recipes and tips.
meanings.sent3: The dieters at the party avoided the tempting desserts.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of treats, the dieters stood out like beacons of self-control.
meanings.sent5: The determined dieters tracked their progress diligently.
